title: AI Scare’s $56 Billion Hit Tests Resilience of India’s IT Stocks
description: For investors bullish on India’s technology services industry, the “AI scare trade” has created an opportunity to buy shares of companies that are able to survive the doomsday predictions.
content: For investors bullish on India’s technology services industry, the “AI scare trade” has created an opportunity to buy shares of companies that are able to survive the doomsday predictions.
